resources.string: Agora Vote is a voting platform where \n users can create elections and invite \nfriends to cast their votes
It supports a wide range of \n voting algorithms some of which are Majority, Egalitarian, Australian STV\n just to name a few
Fast Simple and Securesign in and sign up process
Create Elections very smoothly in few steps and rock the world
After completion of election. See Results very quickly
Feel free to contact us on out gitter channels and work with us on gitlab
Agora vote is a voting \n platform where users can create elections and invite friends to cast their votes.

It supports a wide range 
 of voting algorithms some 
 of which are Majority,
 Egalitarian, Australian 
 STV just to name a few
